an5.10:1.1: “Mendicants, a disrespectful and irreverent mendicant with five qualities can’t achieve growth, improvement, or maturity in this teaching and training.
an5.10:1.3: A disrespectful and irreverent mendicant who is faithless …
an5.10:1.7: witless can’t achieve growth, improvement, or maturity in this teaching and training.
an5.10:1.8: A disrespectful and irreverent mendicant with these five qualities can’t achieve growth, improvement, or maturity in this teaching and training.
an5.10:2.1: A respectful and reverent mendicant with five qualities can achieve growth, improvement, and maturity in this teaching and training.
an5.10:2.3: A respectful and reverent mendicant who is faithful …
an5.10:2.4: conscientious … prudent … energetic … wise can achieve growth, improvement, and maturity in this teaching and training.
an5.10:2.5: A respectful and reverent mendicant with these five qualities can achieve growth, improvement, and maturity in this teaching and training.”
